thread.title: Girls Athlete of the Week: Ella Charlesworth
thread.title_full: Girls Athlete of the Week: Ella Charlesworth

author: democratandchronicle.com
title: Girls Athlete of the Week: Ella Charlesworth
text:
Name : Ella Charlesworth. School : Brighton.
Class/age : Junior/16.
Sport : Field hockey.
Position ; Center midfielder.
Family : Parents, Leanne and Denis; brother, Luke, 13, who plays modified soccer at Brighton.
Academics : 3.73 GPA.
Last week : Scored four goals in three games, including matchups against Pittsford Sutherland and East Rochester, two of Section V's top teams. She leads the Barons (8-5), a state semifinalist last season, with 14 goals. She has scored three goals or more in three games this season and also has three assists.
"My team is amazing,'' Charlesworth said. "Every single person can shoot from all different areas of the field. That is one of the most amazing things about us and one of our great advantages.
"People take amazing shots and usually I'm the one who tips it or redirects into the goal.''
About me : Wears jersey No. 5 . . . Promoted to Brighton's varsity toward the end of her freshman season ... Secretary of the Class 2017 at Brighton ... Link Crew Leader mentors freshmen ... Co-president of Kick Cancer's Button Club ... Coordinator of the school's Sports Center ... "I feel so lucky to attend such an awesome school.'' ... Girl Scout ... Lifeguard at Midtown Athletic Club ... "I like working with kids and education, but I have nothing set in stone." ... Plays stopper with the Stormers Soccer Club ... Also plays ultimate frisbee with a team named Air Traffic Control.
Brighton junior Ella Charlesworth, a center forward, leads the Barons with 14 goals through 13 games. Video by James Johnson
